scripts.COMMIT: git add -A && git commit -m 'scriptBackup' && git push
scripts.GENERATE PWA ASSETS: npx pwa-asset-generator src/icons/logo.svg src/icons/pwa --splash-only true --background $(grep -Po '^VITE_APP_SPLASH_SCREEN_COLOR=\K.*' .env  ) --favicon true --padding '10%' && npx pwa-asset-generator src/icons/logo.svg public/assets --background $(grep -Po '^VITE_APP_SPLASH_SCREEN_COLOR=\K.*' .env  ) --icon-only true
